attributes.action: Give us a General Election now!
attributes.additional_details: Give the people their democratic right to elect a government now that they have confidence will prioritise their needs not just the needs of The Party and will deliver effective short and long term management of the many serious challenges we face in the interests of all the people of the UK. And, in doing so, give us back our democracy.
attributes.background:
Give us a General Election now!

Restore the democracy you have destroyed in the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
